SEARCH
Module Bran9
Package Shared

Class Appointment

java.lang.Object
Shared.Appointment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Appointment extends Object implements Serializable
The Appointment class represents a medical appointment made by a patient with a doctor. It includes details such as the appointment ID, doctor and patient information, the appointment date, its status, and its outcome.
Author:
Cheng Jun Long Brandon
